name: fullstack-typescript-monorepo
description: Fullstack TypeScript monorepo with NestJS backend and React + Vue frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run stop:frontend && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:verify: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run test:backend && cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd .. && npm run build:all
scripts.verify: npm run lint:backend && npm run test:backend && npm run build:backend
scripts.verify:frontend: npm run lint:frontend && npm run test:frontend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.verify:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run build:all
scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules services/backend/node_modules services/backend/dist services/shared/node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/.next
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run db:start && npm run db:wait && cd services/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:reset: cd services/backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:start && npm run db:wait && npm run prisma:generate && cd services/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:wait: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');let attempts=0;const maxAttempts=36;const check=()=>{try{const status=execSync('docker inspect routing-data-sqlserver --format={{.State.Health.Status}}',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim();if(status==='healthy'){console.log('Database is healthy');process.exit(0);}if(attempts++>=maxAttempts){console.error('Database did not become healthy in time');process.exit(1);}setTimeout(check,5000);}catch(e){if(attempts++>=maxAttempts){console.error('Database container not found or error:',e.message);process.exit(1);}setTimeout(check,5000);}};check();"
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean:all && npm run clean:prisma && npm run install:all && npm run prisma:generate
scripts.stop: npm run stop:backend && npm run stop:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run stop && npm run db:start && npm run db:wait && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend:only" "npm run dev:backend:only" --names "frontend,backend" --prefix-colors "green,blue"
scripts.dev:backend: npm run stop:backend && npm run db:start && npm run db:wait && npm run dev:backend:only
